title: She was determined to have my child
itunes:title: She was determined to have my child
description:
Three years ago, I decided I was going to leave my wife because she had some addiction issues. Prior to leaving my wife, I met a lady at a business convention. She was like a breath of fresh air and we got along great. I ended up leaving my wife and moving in with her. The only problem was the moment I got there, she wanted to have a child.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
